title: Example QA Checklist
testingOrder: This is a test checklist. Click items to cycle through states.

groups.name: Item States
items: Click this item to mark it as Pass (green checkmark)
Click again to mark as Fail (red X)
Click again to mark as Skip (gray, strikethrough)
Click once more to return to Untested

groups.name: Notes
items: Click the + button on this item to add a note
Edit or clear the note after saving

groups.name: Collapse
items: Click the section header to collapse this section

groups.name: Progress
items: The progress bar at the top updates as you check items
The section header shows pass/total count
